root: ^Glad to hear that the last book did well. Here is the sequel. It is good.

^Now that Kean and Dom are official, their relationship has been a bit slow– the fun of a whirlwind romance wore down. They still love each other but have both agreed that something needs to give. Enter: the polyamorous Sebastian Sanders. One night at a bar together, Kean and Dom lay eyes on a flirty new prospect. They learn that he works at a local sandwich shop right across from where Kean used to work. With this new information, the courting begins. ~Will Dom and Kean’s relationship stay strong? Will they be able to romance Sebastian together? Will it all end in a steamy finale? Only the Dom will decide.
